pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## Welcome to Dathost’s unofficial python wrapper!This is a unofficial asynchronous & synchronous wrapper for Dathost’s API.### Features:- Full API coverage.- Asynchronous & synchronous support.- Easy to use with an object oriented design.- 100% test coverage.### Install- Pip: ``pip3 install dathost``- Git: ``pip3 install git+https://github.com/WardPearce/dathost.git``### Documentation[Documentation](https://dathost.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)### Thanks to- [Encode for creating HTTPX](https://www.python-httpx.org/)
